allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 2A: Video Editor Basic Features

Added core video editor functionality:
- Editor state management with Zustand (store/editorStore.ts)
- Multi-track timeline system with drag & drop
- Video player with playback controls
- Transition effects system (fade, wipe, dissolve)
- Editor main page and project workspace

Components:
- VideoTimeline: Multi-track timeline with zoom controls
- TimelineTrack: Individual track with visibility/lock controls
- TimelineClip: Draggable/resizable clips with transitions
- VideoPlayer: Canvas-based player with frame rendering
- TransitionPicker: UI for selecting and configuring transitions

Features:
- Track management (add/remove video, canvas, audio tracks)
- Clip operations (add, remove, move, trim)
- Playback controls (play, pause, stop, seek)
- Frame-accurate rendering
- Transition preview support

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 2B: Canvas Overlay System

Added Fabric.js-based canvas overlay system:
- Canvas wrapper utilities for Fabric.js operations
- FabricCanvas component with object management
- Drawing tools (text, shapes, images)
- Keyframe animation editor
- Canvas-video synchronization system

Components:
- FabricCanvas: Main canvas component with Fabric.js integration
- CanvasTools: Toolbar for adding text, shapes, and images
- Keyframes: Animation editor for creating keyframe animations

Libraries:
- canvas.ts: Fabric.js wrapper with helper functions
- sync.ts: Canvas-video synchronization manager with frame caching

Features:
- Object creation (text, rectangle, circle, image)
- Object manipulation (move, scale, rotate)
- Layer management (bring to front, send to back)
- Keyframe animation system with easing
- Frame-by-frame rendering with caching
- Keyboard shortcuts (delete, copy, paste)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
